column1: starts with a slightly full ball around off, Masakadza comes forward and defends
fuller around off once again, Masakadza pushes it towards the left of mid-off, no run once again
pitched up once more around off, driven towards mid-off from the front foot
length ball outside off this time, Masakadza gets forward once again and pushes it towards covers
length ball outside off, looks to defend but the ball hits the outer half and rolls towards backward point
fuller, on the stumps this time, worked towards mid-on. A maiden to start with
short of length but down the leg side and Zimbabwe are off the mark with a wide
better line this time, short of length again and shaping back in a bit, Burl trusts the bounce and leaves it alone, goes over the stumps
a touch fuller but once again straying down the leg side
short of length on middle and leg, tucked away towards deep square leg, first runs off the bat
short of length around off, Masakadza gets on his toes and dabs it towards backward point
fuller this time, just around the off stump, defended down the ground
length ball on the stumps, Masakadza once again gets behind the line and blocks
short of length, some room outside off, Masakadza looks to cut it away but fails to connect
length ball around off and moving away from Burl, who looks to play for the line, trying to defend, and gets beaten
length ball around off, Burl is happy to defend it from the back foot

and there's that nick. Promoting Burl up the order hasn't worked. Once again in the channel, length ball just outside off and this time gets an outside edge as Burl fishes there. A regulation catch for Tucker behind the stumps
length ball in the corridor, Ervine shoulders arms
length ball around off, comes forward and looks to defend, the ball misses the bat and hits him on the body
length ball once again, just a little bit outside off, Ervine comes forward and defends. A wicket-maiden to follow a maiden for Murtagh
short of length outside off, goes for the cut but cannot beat the man at the cover
length ball outside off and moving away, Masakadza is happy to leave this time
length ball around off, taps it to the right of the point fielder and gets off the mark with a single
length ball, fifth-stump and line and moving further away from the left-hander who let's it go through
once again in the corridor, a length ball and same response from the batsman, shouldered arms
another length ball, a bit wider on this occasion. Ervine is not interested in chasing those
length ball around off, Masakadza skips down the pitch and looks to go over the top but mistimes it towards mid-off, well short off the fielder though
once again use of feet and gets it right this time, it was a bit fuller this time and Masakadza drives it past the bowler for four, all along the ground
short of length and Masakadza goes for a pull, not in control at all, there is a fielder in the deep but he cannot reach there in time
a touch short this time, some room outside off as well and Ervine takes full advantage of that, cracks it past point for four
length ball in the corridor and left alone
lovely shot, the third boundary off the over. It touch fuller from Murtagh and Ervine lofts it between the bowler and mid-off, great timing on that one
short of length outside off and punched off the back foot between cover and point, suddenly the runs are coming fast and handsome
length ball around off, Masakadza stays on the back foot and defends it towards point
a touch fuller around off, looks to drive down the ground but fails to middle and the ball dribbles towards mid-on
short of length outside off, Masakadza opens the face of the bat to steer it past the diving point fielder, third man comes across to cut it off
chopped on! Was a length ball outside off, Ervine goes for the pull but it's not that short, and he ends up dragging it back and Zimbabwe in trouble at 22 for 2
beaten! Was a length ball outside off, Taylor pushes at it and misses
length ball around off, Masakadza once again comes down the ground but had to defend in the end
a touch fuller in the line of the stumps, pushes it past the non-striker and sets off for a quick single
fuller on the stumps, flicked away in front of square leg, was in the air but away from the fielder
length ball outside off, Masakadza punches it through covers off the back foot for his third four of the innings
short of length on the stumps and Masakadza defends it straight towards that short mid-on fielder
length ball on the pads, goes for the flick and misses, the ball rolls towards square leg off the thigh
a touch fuller around off, defended towards mid-on from the crease
length ball around off, defended once again from the crease
length ball in the channel, shouldered arms this time
short of length around fifth stump, defended from the back foot
a touch fuller around off, Taylor almost chips it back towards the bowler who jumps but the ball just evades him. A couple of runs for the batsman
fuller around off, pushed towards the left of the bowler who dives across and gets a hand to it
length ball around off, comes forward and defends
length ball around off and coming in with the angle, uses his feet and flicks it towards midwicket
length ball around off, looks to defend, there is a mild appeal for lbw but denied

length ball around off and middle, Taylor looks to flick it aerially over midwicket but gets a leading edge towards the right of Porterfield who judges it will and takes it reverse cups, tumbling on his back
length ball around off, comes forward and defends
length ball around off, comes forward and defends it towards cover-point, a diving stop there prevents the single
length ball in the corridor, left alone
length ball outside off, pushes it through covers for a couple
short of length around off, pushed towards point where the fielder makes a diving stop
short of length outside off, Williams looks to go for the pull but misses
length ball around off, pushes it towards extra cover
short of length and angling in to the body, swatted away past square leg for four
length ball around off, pushes it towards the left of mid-off, a tumbling stop there to keep it to one
a touch fuller around off, comes forward and defends it towards mid-off
length ball around off, gets behind the line and offers a solid defence
length ball around off, pushed towards extra cover off the back foot
length ball around off, defended down the ground from the crease
length ball around off, punches it towards point off the back foot
stars with a short of length ball around off, punched towards covers off the back foot for a single
fuller around off, mistimes the drive towards extra cover
length ball angling in, flicked away towards midwicket for one
length ball around off, pushes at it, gets a thick outside edge towards third man
length ball around off, gets behind it and pushes it towards mid-off
length ball around off, punched off the back foot but Stirling makes a tumbling stop in covers
fuller around off, driven on the front foot but straight towards mid-off
length ball around off, defends it towards extra cover off the back foot
length ball around off, pushes it towards mid-off, another dot
length ball in the corridor, left alone by Williams
fuller around off, comes forward and mistimes the drive to mid-on
short of length outside off, goes for the cut but cannot get past the point
length ball around off, looks to drive on the up, the bottom hand comes off the bat as the ball dribbles towards extra cover
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-on who lob-throws at the striker's end and hits the stumps direct, resulting in an overthrow
a cracking pull shot in front of square by Williams, was short in length but Williams was quick to transfer his weight bat and swat it for four
back-to-back fours here. Was a touch fuller, mind you not a half-volley but Williams presents the full face of the bat and beats mid-off for another boundary
short of length on middle and leg, tucked away towards deep square leg for a couple, good running between the wickets there, and that's 50 up for Zimbabwe
another good-looking drive but the cover fielder puts in the dive to make the stop, was outside off but not overpitched
short of length around off, Masakadza gets on his toes and defends it down
length ball on middle and leg, tucked away towards short midwicket
fuller around off, comes forward to drive but straight towards mid-on
a touch fuller from the bowler, Masakadza looks to go aerial but mistimes it towards mid-on, towards the right of the mid-on
short of length outside off, cuts it towards deep backward point for one
length ball around off, defended towards covers from the crease
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards fine leg but looks like no bat involved there
fuller around off, defended under his eyes by Williams
short of length around off, goes for the cut but ends up chopping it into the ground
length ball outside off, opens the face of the bat to work it towards third man
length ball but down the leg side, called a wide
fuller around off, goes for the drive but finds Stirling who fails to make a clean stop and concedes a single
beaten! Short of length and coming in with the angle, cramps the batsman who was looking to hit it square of the wicket
short of a length at leg stump, clipped between fine leg and deep square
length on leg stump, glanced in front of deep square leg
bowled him! Gap between bat and pad as Masakadza looks to drive on the up against a length ball outside off. It's past his inside edge and hits the top of the stumps
short of a length at middle, shuffles and flicks it down to fine leg
length ball pushed across off stump, left alone
good length at off stump, solidly blocked into the off side
starts full and on the pads. Raza shuffles and uses the angle to tickle this fine
length at middle stump, shuffles again and dabs it with soft hands into the midwicket region
inside edge as he looks to cut this short ball from around the wicket. Keeps a touch low and dribbles to the keeper's right
oh gloriously driven, but can't beat extra cover. Full and wide of off side. Feet move nicely to get him behind the line and then forward. Right off the middle too
short of a length just outside off, defended to point off the back foot
aerial but wide of point. Length ball floated wide outside off. Drives away from the body this time and slices it as it gets big on him. Third man can't stop the second to his left

given lbw! Was just praising how he's been shuffling to open up the leg side, but it's exactly that which is his downfall. A length ball at off, with slant back into the stumps. He shuffles and looks to flick, but he's missed it altogether and is right in front of the stumps. They usually get the Raza rescue, Zimbabwe, but there won't be one today
length and wide outside off, left alone
length on leg stump, glanced down to fine leg off the back foot
short of a length and down leg side. Can't get bat on the flick
short of a length just outside off, guided to point with the angle
length outside off, stabbed to mid-off on the front foot
length at leg stump, deflected to fine leg with a closed face
length outside off, blocked solidly on the front foot
length ball just outside off, defended into the off side
length ball wide outside off and cutting further away. Left alone
length in the channel, punched on the up to mid-off
cuts back in and gets the inside edge. Length ball coming in from the corridor and he pushes at it with hard hands. Single at fine leg in the end
cops it on the body. Short of a length outside off, walks down at it and looks to slug it into the leg side boundary. Hit on the bicep
length on leg stump, dabbed down to fine leg off the back foot
length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length outside off, looks to punch through the off side, gets it into the covers off the under-edge
beaten. Short and wide outside off, can't get bat on the cut
length and just outside off, blocked on the front foot
length and wide outside off, sliced down to third man
length at off stump, defended down the pitch
good length just outside off, blocked on the front foot
whipped forcefully into the leg side. Length outside off, and he's got it off the thick inside edge
short of a length and angled into the corridor. Tapped to midwicket off the inside half
keeps low and past the cut. Short and wide, beats the under-edge and goes on the bounce to the keeper
length and just outside off, poked to point's left off the front foot
short of a length outside off, punched on the rise to mid-off
length outside off, drilled on the rise to mid-off
short of a length on middle stump, mistimed whip to midwicket
length ball just outside off, punched on the up to mid-off
length at off stump, pushed to midwicket's right with soft hands
short of a length outside off, defended watchfully off the back foot
length and cutting away outside off. Pokes at it and is beaten
beaten again. Length ball outside off, looks to punch and is beaten
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on leg stump, allows it to come on and tickles it past short fine. Expertly done
length outside off, defended down the pitch
length at middle stump, dragged into the leg side off the inside half as he looks to punch off the back foot
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length just outside off, places it neatly to third man's right
length on middle stump, blocked on the front foot
nicely placed again. Short of a length outside off, stretches out his arms and guides it between cover point and backward point

bowled him! Looks like an inside edge. Mire had started to look very solid and organized, but he's looked for an expansive drive without moving his front foot. Massive gap between bat and pad. Ball hits the outside of leg stump
length on off stump, shuffles a long way across and flicks to square leg
length and just outside off, punched to mid-off on the front foot
length ball outside off, walks into the off side and defends
leading edge lands safely in front of the bowler's stretch to the right. Looked to flick this length ball from off
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's left
length outside off, tapped to extra cover on the front foot
short of a length and wide outside off, left alone

brilliant work at third man from Rankin. Sprints to his right to get to this cut shot, flings himself to the right and whips the ball back in. The momentum pushes it further to the right but he manages to get back up, sprint the ten-odd yards and pick it up before it can touch the boundary line
short of a length at the hip, whipped down to fine leg
length and just outside off, defended off the back foot
length and just outside off, chopped to backward point with an open face
edged and no slip in. Rankin is far too distant to get to this. Length ball angled in from wide of the crease leaves him off the surface as he defends inside the line
oh well played. Full on middle and leg and he whips handsomely to mid-on's right
short of a length and in at off stump. Looks to punch, mistimes and it rolls back down the pitch
length and cramping him at leg stump. Stabs one-handed to midwicket
length at leg stump, flicked to long leg
length on middle stump, shuffles and clips to square leg
length at off stump, defended from the crease
length on leg stump, pushed to midwicket from deep in the crease
short of a length outside off, tapped to mid-off on the back foot
full on middle stump, driven to mid-on's right
short of a length just outside off, defended to cover's right
length outside off, gets forward and defends to backward point off the outside half
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square's right
short of a length outside off, left alone
length and wide outside off, left alone
short of a length outside off, punched to sweeper's right
length on middle stump, defended on the front foot
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
length at off stump, dropped into the off side with soft hands
length outside off, stabbed to third man's right off the front foot
lofted wide of mid-on. Nice balance there. Full ball on off stump and gently picked up, with the angle
full outside off, driven to mid-off's left
nearly chopped on. Short of a length just outside off, looks to nudge through the covers but gets an inside edge onto pad
short of a length on leg stump, whipped between deep square and fine leg
short at middle stump, pulled to deep square's right
short outside off, punched to sweeper cover
length ball around off, catching the batsman on the crease, a thick outside edge towards third man
short and wide and Williams goes for the cut but straight towards the sweeper
length ball on the stumps, defended from the crease
length ball on the stumps, flicked away towards deep square leg for one
length ball around off, taps it towards backward point from the crease
short of length and bouncing towards the batsman who sort of fends at it and gets a single to third man
fuller outside off, steered towards sweeper cover by Williams
length ball around off, flicked towards square leg for one more
fuller outside off, driven nicely but straight towards mid-off
fuller outside off, drives it towards deep extra cover for one
short of length outside off, punches it towards the left of mid-off
fuller outside off, pushed into the covers from the crease
short of length outside off, steered straight towards point
length ball around off, backs away a bit and opens the face to play it towards point once again
back of length outside off, steered down towards third man this time for one
a short one from Rankin, but outside off. Mutumbami ducks and sways away from the line
length ball in the corridor, fifth stump line, left alone
short of length around off, defended into the ground from the back foot
length ball around off from around the wicket, defended on the off side
a low full toss but Williams was early into the drive, toe-ends it towards mid-off
length ball outside off, driven on the up towards deep extra cover, only a single as the fielder moves quickly to his left to cut it off
length ball outside off and hit past the diving mid-on on the left, was in the air but safe and reaches the boundary
length ball outside off, opens the face to work it behind point for one
a touch fuller outside off and Williams chips it wide off the mid-off fielder, sweeper cuts it off once again
and gone! Short of length outside off, Mutumbami pushes at it, gets an outside edge and Tucker takes a fine catch to his right
length ball around off, defended tentatively from the crease
short of length on middle and leg, worked away towards fine leg
short of length outside off, Williams pushes at and gets beaten
short of length outside off, pushes it towards point where the fielder makes a tumbling stop
length ball in the corridor once again, gets Williams to push at it, beaten once more
short and wide, Jarvis hits it towards mid-off
length ball outside off, pushes it uppishly towards cover where O'Brien makes a one-handed pick-up and throw, misses the stumps at the bowler's end
length ball around off, defended from the back foot
short of length and angling in towards the batsman who works it towards midwicket for one
length ball around off, pushes it towards short midwicket
a bouncer this time, just around the off stump, Jarvis does well to sway away
short of length outside off, punches it past the point fielder, comes back for the second
smashed through the covers. Was full outside off and Williams gave it his all, beats the man at the sweeper cover
pitched up once again, driven firmly but straight towards extra cover this time
short and wide outside off, Williams goes for the cut and misses
a touch fuller on this occasion, pushes it towards backward point where the fielder dives to his right to make the stop
a lifter, extra bounce from a length outside off, Williams pushes at it and gets beaten as the ball moves a bit away after landing
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards midwicket but Balbirnie makes a good stop to his right to prevent the single
length ball outside off, pushes at it and gets beaten
length ball on the stumps, works it towards short midwicket
length ball around off and middle, drives it towards mid-on but doesn't get the timing right
fuller and outside off, Jarvis moves down and across and swing across, misses
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot through extra cover, beats the chasing mid-off for four
length ball angling in towards the batsman, Williams flicks it towards deep backward square leg and gets to his fifty
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-off
length ball outside off, pushes at it and gets beaten, extra bounce there as well for O'Brien
length ball outside off, swings across and gets a top edge but it lands well short of third man
length ball outside off, driven on the up through covers, the sweeper moves to his left to cut it off
fuller outside off and drilled down the ground, mid-on puts in the dive and deflects it towards mid-off
length ball around off, looks to push on the off side, gets an inside edge on to the pads
a touch fuller around off and Williams goes aerial, dragging it over mid-on and it trickles towards the boundary line
short of length outside off, pulls it towards the right of mid-on where Porterfield makes a sliding stop
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot but cannot beat the cover
length ball outside off, defended in the same direction this time
short of length around off, pushes it towards short midwicket from the back foot
fuller around off, driven towards long-on but only a single
length ball outside off, pushes it towards mid-off
fuller around off and middle, Jarvis glances it fine for a single
short of length around off, drops it on the off side and looks for a single but the point fielder was quick to the ball
length ball around off, goes back and pulls it towards deep square leg, one-bounce to the fielder
length ball around off, pushes it towards long-on for one more
a touch fuller on the stumps, driven uppishly towards long-on
length ball on the pads, flicked away off his hips towards deep square leg, comes back for the second
short of length and pulled away behind square leg, another couple of runs to the total
length ball on the pads once more, flicked behind square leg but only a single this time
length ball around off, pushes it towards mid-off from the front foot
length ball on the pads, flicked towards deep backward square leg
a bouncer from Rankin, aimed right at the batsman who takes his eyes off the ball, and looks away, gets hit on the forearm. Rankin checks with the batsman and it's all good
short of length on the stumps, Jarvis backs away and looks to hit on the leg side, misses. An appeal for the caught-behind but it hit the thigh
length ball around off, pushes it towards mid-off and gets off the strike
short of length outside off, backs away and makes a wild swing, finds thin air
short and wide this time, Williams looks to steer behind point, misses
length outside off, opens the face of the bat to get a single to third man
short of length outside off, pulls it firmly but straight towards deep square leg
another short one and Jarvis has pulled it over midwicket, not from the middle of the bat but enough on it take it to for four

an unfortunate run-out at the non-striker's end. Was a short ball outside off, Jarvis smashes it straight back at the bowler who fails to catch it but the deflection breaks the stumps at the bowler's end and Williams wasn't quick enough to get back, departs for 67
fuller and in the slot, was a slower ball as well. Jarvis picks it up and launches it over long-on for a six, for the first six of the innings
a short one this time and Jarvis goes for the pull, gets a top-edge but that lands safely near short fine leg and away from the keeper running to get under
length ball around off and smashed past the mid-off for four. A big over for Zimbabwe, 17 coming from it
goes for the yorker, beats the bat and hits Mpofu on the pads. An appeal for lbw but the umpire thinks it would have gone on to miss the leg stump
short of length around off, Jarvis is cramped for the room as he look to hit through the off side, an easy catch for the substitute fielder at point
fuller on the stumps, Chatara fails to get his bat down on time and gets struck on the back leg. An appeal for lbw but the umpire says not out. A couple of leg-byes to fine leg
fuller around off, manges to work it towards third man
length ball on middle and leg, pushes it in front of square on the leg side
short of length outside off, backs away and pushes it towards covers
length ball down the leg side, clipping the pads on its way to the keeper
length ball on middle and leg, walks down the wicket and chips it behind square leg for one
length ball around off, pushes at it, the ball hits the outer half and rolls towards cover
short ball down the leg side, Chatara goes for the pull, gets some glove on it but Tucker drops the catch
bowled 'im! So the drop doesn't prove expensive as Murtagh yorks Chatara for his third wicket of the game
length and swung away outside off, left alone
slapped on the up between extra cover and mid-off. Dropped short of a length and he climbs on top of it before dismissing it
short and wide, chopped into the turf off the back foot. Cover dives to his left to stop

glorious. When you're in form, you do whatever you want. Decent outswinger, at a length and just outside off from Jarvis. Stirling plants the front leg down the pitch and punches it on the rise through cover
beaten. Short of a length outswinger and it's one drive too many on the rise
short of a length at off stump, defended into the covers
length at off stump and rising into the hip as he looks to flick this
length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length and climbing in the corridor, chopped to third man's right

dropped! At cover! Sean Williams runs himself into circles and loses balance after Stirling gets a leading edge. Runs backwards, stops, then forward as he's facing the long-off boundary. Lunges and puts it down
length on leg stump, flicked to fine leg
shot. Short of a length outside off. Shuffles and chops it past point from close to his body
short of a length, swing away from off stump. And a lot of rise as this is left alone
short of a length outside off, left alone
length and curving away from the corridor, left alone
short and curving away outside off. Looks to pull, is <strike>beaten on</strike> caught on the under-edge. It dies on the keeper who can't gather it cleanly. Deflected towards fine leg
length on leg stump, flicked to fine leg's left
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on leg stump, nudged through the vacant square leg region
length and wide outside off, chopped on the rise to backward point
length on leg stump, flicked to fine leg
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
lbw appeal is turned down. Length ball outside off. He gets across into the off side to try and flick it. Probably stuck outside off
length at off stump, shuffles across, gets in a tangle, but manages to deflect this fine and to the boundary
length on off stump, blocked from the crease
short of a length at off stump, opens the face and runs it to third man
falls short of slip. Length outside off. Has a waft at it and gets a thick edge that doesn't carry to first slip's right
past the edge. Steep climb from back of a length outside off. Past his shoulder as he looks to defend away from the body
beaten again. Walks down the pitch to cover the off stump line, but this keeps swinging away from a length and past his jab
beaten. Length and swinging away outside off. Looks to drive away from the body, beaten
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, driven back to the bowler who deflects it towards mid-off
length and wide outside off. Walks across and whips it to fine leg
chipped wide of mid-on. Full on middle stump, not enough connection to get it into the boundary
length and just outside off, tapped to mid-off on the rise
length in the corridor, opens the face and pushes to point's left
length on middle stump, defended into the leg side
length on off stump, defended down the pitch
misfield and that runs away. Length ball just outside off, punched to cover's right and his tumble isn't good enough
length outside off, left alone
short of a length just outside off, defended into the covers
lbw appeal turned down. Length and at leg stump. Looks to flick and cops it on the pads. Could be both going down and too high
short of a length outside off, mistimed punch to short extra cover
whipped out to fine leg
length on off stump, blocked down the pitch
beaten. Length and rising outside off. Looks to drive on the up and it's too steep for him
length and wide outside off. Reaches out and slices on the rise to beat third man to his right
length outside off, tapped to point's right off the front foot
short and wide outside off, left alone
length outside off, pushed down to third man off the outside half
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
length outside off, blocked into the covers
length on middle stump, watchfully pushed to mid-on off the front foot
stopped in the covers. Lovely cover drive but it looks like Raza who gets in the way, lunging across to his left. Stirling got his weight into this full ball outside off
past mid-off. Great shape again as he drives. Length outside off, on the up a touch, but in full control to bisect mid-off and extra cover
slashed past point. Short and very wide outside off, springs onto the back foot and makes nice connection on the cut
full on middle stump, driven to mid-on's left
narrowly past the stumps! Length ball outside off, chucks his hands at it. Gets an inside edge onto pad and the ball trickles wide of the stumps
length outside off, looks to drive for the one that goes away. This holds its line and beats his inside edge
length in the corridor, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, driven to mid-off's left on the rise
length at off stump, defended to point off the front foot
length at off stump, defended to extra cover
short and wide outside off, left alone
length on leg stump, flicked to fine leg's left
good length at off stump, defended down the pitch
length at leg stump, flicked to deep square
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
full and wide outside off, driven along the floor to sweeper cover
full and shaping away from middle. Pushed to mid-on's left
length outside off, nudged to point's left off the front foot
length outside off, shuffles and flicks to mid-on's right
length and wide outside off, left alone
full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
length outside off, jabbed to mid-on off the front foot
length at leg stump, defended off the back foot
got him! Stirling won't become the second ODI batsman to get seven 50-plus scores in a row. Short of a length outside off, looks to cut but that gets big on him late and he can only edge it behind
length at off stump, defended into the leg side
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
length on leg stump, flicked past short leg
length outside off, leans in and drives to long-off
full on middle, steps out and flicks to midwicket
length at the stumps, defended on the back foot
full on leg stump, steps out and flicks to midwicket
length on leg stump, flicked to square leg
length outside off, leans in and drives on the up to bisect cover and point who both give chase, unsuccessfully
length on off stump, flicked to midwicket's left
length and just outside off, defended to point off the back foot
length at off stump, pushed to midwicket
short of a length and slanted into the corridor. Left alone
taken at mid-on. Balbirnie is late on the sweep and manages only a top edge out to the fielder. Length at off stump, pushed flat and he wants to sweep but is in terrible shape to pull it off
fuller on the stumps, pushes it back towards the bowler
length ball around off, looks to defend on the front foot, gets a thick outside edge towards cover-point
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards short midwicket
off the mark with a single to long-on. Was fuller once more, Porterfield drives it on the front foot
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards square leg
length ball around off, comes forward and defends it down the wicket
length ball on the stumps, works it towards short midwicket
length ball around off, drives it towards extra cover where Mire makes a partial stop
a touch around off, drives it from the front foot but cannot beat the cover fielder
pitched up again, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-off and sets off for a quick single
fuller around off, pushed towards cover from the front foot
fuller outside off, looks to come down the track but Williams has fired it quicker and wider, McCollum does well to get bat on it
fuller on the stumps, goes for the sweep and misses. A big appeal for lbw but the umpire's not interested, signals leg-bye
flatter on the stumps, McCollum is struck in the crease but does well to get his bat down in time
dragged short this time and McCollum rocks back and pull it over midwicket for a flat six
length ball around off, Porterfield gets behind it and blocks
short of length around off, angling away from the left-hander, defends it towards point with soft hands
fuller and wider and Porterfield smashes it hard but the mid-off field makes an excellent stop diving to his right
short of length around off, gets on his toes and defends it back
short of length around off, defends it towards cover with an angled bat
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it in the direction of mid-on
fuller around off, drives it nicely towards long-off for one
on the pads, worked just past Ervine at short leg
fuller on the stumps, works it towards short midwicket
fuller on the pads, flicked away towards deep midwicket, a diving stop at deep square leg, but it looked like the ball rolled on to touch the boundary line. The umpire thinks otherwise
short of length around off, goes back and cuts but finds the extra cover fielder
short of length from around the wicket and Porterfield has pulled it fine towards the vacant fine leg for four
short of length once again, pulls it straight, looks like it hit the non-striker's leg on its way towards long-on
fuller and wider outside off, goes for the drive but cannot connect
fuller around off, comes forward and defends
fuller and wider outside off, looks to smash it through the off side, beaten
short of length around off, drops it towards covers from the back foot. Was looking to sneak in a single but decides against it in the end. He is on 3999 ODI runs
almost in the blockhole, McCollum jams his bat at it
short of length outside off, McCollum was looking to go down the wicket but it's too wide and he just hangs his bat out there. A thick outside edge goes past the diving Taylor behind the stumps
short of length outside off, punches it towards deep extra cover for one
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on. Still stuck on 3999
short of length on the stumps, tucked away towards short midwicket
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover
length ball outside off, punches it towards backward point
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards mid-on and sets off. A direct hit from Mire but the batsman was home

and that's 4000 ODI runs for Porterfield, the second batsman from Ireland after Stirling to reach there. Was a short of length ball around off, gets a leading edge towards covers but lands safe. A quick single takes Porterfield to the milestone
fuller around off, McCollum leans into the drive and beats mid-off, takes Ireland to 99
short of length outside off, left alone
short and wide, goes for the cut. Comes back for the second before the throw comes in from the sweeper cover. 100 is up for Ireland
short of length outside off, comes forward and defends it towards covers
short of length outside off, punches it towards point where the fielder dives it his left to make the stop
creams it through extra cover and gets to his fifty. Was full outside off and he drove it handsomely from the front foot
tucked away towards square leg for an easy single
fuller outside off and angling away, hits it towards extra cover
fuller and wider and this time Porterfield doesn't miss out, lofts it over mid-off for a boundary
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it back towards the bowler
short of length outside off, goes for the cut but chops it into the ground
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it back, Mpofu makes a stop in his followthrough
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot towards point
length outside off, looks to smash it through the off side, on the up, gets beaten
length ball around off, pushes it towards covers for a quick single
fuller outside off, looks to carve it through the off side but ends up slicing it towards point where Burl takes a good low catch
short of length, in the rib cage, O'Brien gets inside the line and works it behind square, might have been off the glove in fact
short of length outside off, looks to pull it away but doesn't connect
short outside off and pulled away behind square leg, only a single though
another bouncer but too high and given a wide
length ball around off, comes forward and defends
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot past the diving extra cover, the mid-off fielder puts in the chase to keep it to two
length ball around off, comes forward and defends it back
length ball around off, pushed back towards the bowler once more
length outside off and Porterfield punches it past the diving cover for four
length ball outside off, comes forward and defends it towards point
fuller around off, comes forward and drops it towards covers
a short ball from Mpofu, pulled aerially towards fine leg by Porterfield, only a single

fuller around off, Porterfield chips it aerially towards mid-off, looked like it fell just short in the real time but the fielder is claiming the catch. Porterfield is not going anywhere and the umpire thinks he is right to stand his ground. Not out
fuller around off, hit firmly towards mid-off once more
length ball on the stumps, turns it towards short midwicket for one
short of length outside off, taps it towards backward point
length ball on the pads, looks to flick it away but misses, hit high on the thigh
short of length down the leg side, flicks it behind square leg for a couple
length ball outside off, driven on the up towards sweeper cover
short ball, O'Brien gets off his feet and drops it down towards fine leg
short of length around off, whipped away towards deep square leg
short of length outside off, drops it towards point and sets off for a quick single
short of length outside off, cuts it hard towards sweeper cover
another short one, O'Brien goes for the hook but cannot connect
length ball around off, leans forward and pushes it towards extra cover
a reverse sweep this time and gets a couple of runs to third man
length ball on the pads, flicks it towards short midwicket
flatter and quicker and another reverse sweep by Porterfield, struck firmly this time and gets a boundary for his efforts
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards extra cover
tossed up around off, comes forward and defends it towards extra cover
length ball around off, looks to flick it on the leg side but misses
another short one, KOB goes for the hook, off the glove it seems but Taylor fails to latch on to it, a single as the ball deflects towards fine leg off the keeper's gloves
length ball around off, drops it towards covers and sets off for a quick run
fuller on the pads, clipped away towards deep square leg
short again and pulled away towards deep square leg, fielder there
short of length, swivels to pull but fails to make a neat connection, the ball falls just behind the stumps
fuller on the leg stump, Porterfield goes for the conventional sweep this time and beats the diving Mire at square leg for another four
another one down the leg side and another sweep from Porterfield, finds the gap between square leg and short fine leg this time. Back-to-back fours
length ball around off, pushes it towards covers off the back foot
fuller around off, comes forward and defends on the off side
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards square leg
fuller around off, comes forward and defends
bangs in short, O'Brien goes for the pull but misses, gets hit on the right forearm
fuller around off, driven towards cover-point from the front foot
length ball around off and middle, worked away towards square leg
length ball around off, comes forward and offers a solid defence
short of length outside off, pulled away towards deep square leg, Raza there
short of length down the leg side, looks to flick it fine but Taylor makes a one-handed diving stop to his left
length at middle stump, defended on the back foot
creams it to mid-off's right. He gets a hand on it but there's enough for the ball to dribble into the boundary. Full and wide and he gets low to drill this on the front foot
just clears extra cover. Length ball pushed across off stump. Looks to slog into the leg side, loses his shape and ends up slicing it high. Too far away from the fielder
length on off stump, defended to point off the front foot
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's right
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's left
short of a length outside off, tapped to extra cover off the back foot
length on off stump, defended to point off the front foot
short at off stump, punched to extra cover off the back foot
length at off stump, defended to extra cover off the back foot
short and just outside off, cut to sweeper's left
length on middle, flicked to square leg
length outside off, punched on the rise to mid-off's left
short of a length on leg stump, flicked to fine leg
length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
length at off stump, driven on the up to mid-off
full outside off, driven to extra cover's right
full on off stump, pushed with the turn to long-off

bowled him! Porterfield falls short of a fifty. Burl rewarded for his eight nicely landed legbreaks that built the pressure. Rips this in from a length outside off as Porterfield backs away to try and punch through cover. Past the inside edge and into middle and off
length outside off, slider. Hits the inside half of the bat as he gets forward to defend
misfield at mid-off. Oh that's through from right under Jarvis. Tossed up outside off, driven firmly and just to his left and he can't get down in time to stop it
full on middle stump, pushed into the leg side
beaten. Length outside off, draws him forward and lifts it past the outside edge
length outside off, chopped to point on the up
chipped over the non-striker and past mid-on. Length on middle stump, wanted to go straighter but this stops on him. It's off the low part of a turning bat, but it's enough
length at middle stump, blocked on the front foot
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
short of a length on middle stump, tucked to deep square's right off the back foot
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
tickled fine. Short and headed down leg. Waited on it and clipped it past short fine
length outside off, driven on the rise to deep extra cover
length outside off, looks to drive on the rise and is beaten
length at off and straightens past the outside edge as he defends for the slider on his front foot
tossed up outside off, driven to extra cover's right, he stops with a dive
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot

lbw appeal turned down and the ball flies to the keeper's left and trickles into the fine boundary. Length ball angled in as he fishes for it outside off. Clips the flap outside the line and that saves him
length outside off, defended to point
short of a length outside off, defended off the back foot
length outside off, driven off the toe-end into the off side
length outside off, opens the face and runs it to third man
length outside off, left alone
length on leg stump, gets down and laps this to the long leg boundary. Used the pace on it
length on middle stump, defended into the leg side
full on leg stump, leans in and deflects to short fine's right
full on off stump, pushed to extra cover's left off the front foot
length outside off, pokes at it and is beaten on the outside edge
lifts it over extra cover. Tossed up full outside off and he reaches out and uses the turn to get this well to the left of wide long-off
inside edge past leg stump as he gets forward and has a jab at this length ball outside off. Rolls feebly to fine leg's right and they take a second
and that is 3-0! Length outside off, pushes at it on the front foot, gets a bat pad pitch side on the off side and KOB calls through for the run
